scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development watchify ./src/index.js -o ./server/dist/bundle.js -g envify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-1 react ] ] -dv
scripts.build-app: NODE_ENV=production browserify ./src/index.js -o ./server/dist/bundle.js -g envify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-1 react ] ] -dv
